1.0.name: wordpress/export-comment-authors
1.0.description: Export Comment Authors lets you extract the Names, Email Addresses and more of your Comment Authors into a CSV file. This plugin is a great way to jump start a newsletter by importing the resulting CSV file into any of the popular newsletter services like MailChimp, AWeber or Campaign Monitor. It can also be used to extract information on a per post basis for things like contests.
